name: Konga Donk
description:
Your castle is being invaded by knights! Pick up barrels and throw them down the stairs to knock down the knights. 

You control using the arrow keys and space. Hold space to throw a barrel harder and kill more enemies.

Created by 
Tomas Anker Præstholm
MK
Nicolai Brobak
Tara Heather Kelly

Thanks to Mads Martinussen for sound FX

Congratulations to Mikkel S on the highscore at the jam with 6450 points!
